name: Akmi Lake (Prototype)
description:
This project was made for Fishing Jam 2.

AWSD/Arrow Keys - Move/Steer

E - Interact

Tab - Look at Time and Cardinal direction

F - Lights on/off

Look down at the frozen lake and press E to start fishing.

Use the snowmobile to get around faster.

Please keep in mind it is still in a very rough and unfinished state.

if you want to keep up with the development of this game and other games you can follow me on my twitter and tumblr:

  • twitter
  • tumblr
